a.detail: A group of demonic faces have been carved into the walls
a.summary: A group of demonic faces have been carved into the walls

c.detail: Withered corpses are nailed to the corridor walls
c.summary: Withered corpses are nailed to the corridor walls

details.history: The dungeon was created by a cult of elemental earth as a lair. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has fallen to ruin and been rebuilt many times since then.
details.illumination: Average (shadowy in corridors, magical light in most rooms)

detail.room_features: A magical pool in the south-east corner of the room summons a water elemental to serve whomever drinks from it (but only once), and someone has scrawled "Beatrey Gelnne was here" on the west wall
A tapestry of a legendary battle hangs from the north wall, and several adventurer corpses are scattered throughout the room

east.desc: Locked Good Wooden Door (DC 20 to open, DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

monster: Treasure: 20 x small gold bar (2 lb, 100 gp), an incomplete set of 4 x lacquered wooden chalice engraved with elven script (750 gp each), Staff of Flowers (common, dmg 308), Nature's Mantle (uncommon, dmg 280)
detail.room_features: The floor is covered in perfect hexagonal tiles, and someone has scrawled an arcane symbol on the east wall

north.desc: Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)
Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 25 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)

west.desc: Locked Good Wooden Door (DC 20 to open, DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

detail.room_features: The north and east walls have been engraved with geometric patterns, and someone has scrawled a large X on the west wall
A narrow shaft descends from the room into the next dungeon level down, and a carved stone statue stands in the north-east corner of the room

east.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

detail.room_features: A narrow shaft falls into the room from above, and someone has scrawled "three, ten, seven" in draconic script on the south wall

east.desc: Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

west.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

east.desc: Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp)
Unlocked Good Wooden Door (15 hp) (slides up)

north.desc: Locked Good Wooden Door (DC 25 to open, DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

west.desc: Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

east.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

detail.room_features: A wooden platform hangs over a deep pit in the west side of the room, and a circle of tall stones stands in the center of the room

east.desc: Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

hidden_treasure: Hidden (DC 20 to find) Locked Good Wooden Chest (DC 15 to unlock, DC 20 to break; 15 hp)
1300 pp, 70 x small gold bar (2 lb, 100 gp), Silvered Weapon (common, dmg 304), Ammunition of Slaying (very rare, dmg 228), Dwarven Plate (very rare, dmg 255)
trap:
Falling Cage Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 16 save or become confined

west.desc: Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp) (slides to one side)

monster: 5 x Stone Golem (cr 10, mm 301); low, 29500 xp

west.desc: Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

north.desc: Locked Stone Door (DC 20 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)

south.desc: Locked Good Wooden Door (DC 25 to open, DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

detail.room_features: An enchanted pool in the south side of the room summons a water elemental to serve whomever drinks from it (but only once), and an iron sarcophagus sits in the south-east corner of the room

south.desc: Locked Stone Door (DC 20 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)
Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 25 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)

wandering_monsters.1: Nothic (cr 2, mm 228) and 9 x Aberrant Cultist (cr 8, mm 86); low, 35550 xp; hunting for food
wandering_monsters.2: 8 x Gray Slaad (cr 9, mm 286); moderate, 40000 xp; wielding bizarre eldritch powers
wandering_monsters.3: 15 x Mage (cr 6, mm 199) and 1 x Earth Elemental (cr 5, mm 108); low, 36300 xp; gathered around an evil shrine
wandering_monsters.4: Efreeti (cr 11, mm 109) and 11 x Elemental Cultist (cr 8, mm 87); moderate, 50100 xp; searching for an elemental rift
wandering_monsters.5: Guardian Naga (cr 10, mm 161) and 10 x Shield Guardian (cr 7, mm 277); low, 34900 xp; bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.6: Archmage (cr 12, mm 199) and 12 x Air Elemental (cr 5, mm 13); low, 30000 xp; consumed by disease and madness
